message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value to you, I propose we set the price at $140. This allows us to share the value while ensuring a fair return for my efforts and resources. I look forward to your consideration.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. However, I am looking to keep my expenses lower. Would it be possible for us to negotiate the price down to $130?

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. To find a middle ground, I propose we set the price at $135 for the product. This still offers a reasonable profit for me while keeping the cost within your desired range. I hope this proposal works for you.

I appreciate your effort to accommodate my budget, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a price of $130 for the product. I believe this offers a fair compromise between the value of the product and my financial constraints.
